events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position including a detailed resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
After reviewing the application, the recruiting team categorised this candidate under the engineering cluster due to their extensive developer background.
Recruiter Sarah Johnson was assigned to manage this candidate’s hiring process and coordinate the next steps for technical evaluation.
Conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s experience with software development and understanding of devops practices.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and confirming availability for further technical interviews.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering lead for April 7th to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving ability.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview showing strong programming knowledge and clear problem-solving thought process.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and candidate expectations for the position.
Completed the HR interview with positive feedback on candidate’s interpersonal skills and alignment with company values.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate including details on salary, benefits, and start date for the software engineer role.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team after review.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed the agreed start date to begin onboarding activities.
The candidate began the onboarding process with HR and the engineering team, completing all required documentation and introductions.
The recruitment process was successfully closed with the new software engineer fully integrated into the team and added to the project roster.
